renderpass.code:
// variant of https://shadertoy.com/view/tlXBRS

#define S(v) smoothstep( 9./R.y , 0. , v )           // AA draw
#define s(v) cos(6.28*v/.09)                         // strip pattern 
#define h(i) fract(4e4*sin(i))
#define H(i) int(2.*h(i))

void mainImage( out vec4 O, vec2 u )
{
    O = vec4(1);
    mat2 M = mat2(1,-1,1,1);                         // for 45Â° rotations
    vec2 R = iResolution.xy,
         U = 3. * ( 2.*u - R ) / 360. + iTime,
         I = floor( U * M ),                         // edge id (vec)
         F = ( fract(U) - .5 ) *M / 1.414, f;        // quad center to edge domain
    
    if (iMouse.z>0.) O -= S( length(F) - .1 );       // dots

    float i = I.x + 10.*I.y +99.,                    // edge id (float)
          r = h(i);                                  // rand(id)
    
    O -= r < .5
        ? f = abs( abs(F) - .2 ),
          F = S( f -.1 ) * s(f),                     //  X at edge
          F.x + F.y 
          - ( F.yx * S(f-.1) ) [int(4.*r)]           //   random crossing order
        : (                                          // )( at edge
            f = sign(F+1e-5),
            H(i)+H(i-f.x)+H(i-10.*f.y-f.x)+H(i-10.*f.y) < 4 // don't draw isolated circles
              ? i = abs( length(F) - .2 ),
                S( i -.1 ) * s(i) 
              : 0. 
           ); 
  //O -= .4*( .5+.5*cos(6.3*r + vec4(0,2,-2,0)) );   // coloring ( debug )
}
